EnemyInfo.Name: Chozo Statue
EnemyInfo.Description:
Standing Chozo statue that can be interacted with by being on the hand in morphball. There's a Wrecked Ship version (facing left) that walks forward and a Norfair Version (facing right) that change the FX liquid level.
The hand object has hard coded locations not relative to the statue enemy's position: $AA:E777 : 4A,17 ;} Wrecked Ship chozo hand X,Y position $AA:E79D : 0C,1D ;} Spawn Lower chozo hand X,Y position
